page.title: 16Employment.
page.content: The whole area is mainly industrial. There are a few farms around the edges of the area but these are usually small hill farms concentrating on sheep and cattle. At one time the area was famous for Copper smelting and coal mining but these industries eventually died out. More recently the main employers in the district were Margam Steelworks, Briton Ferry Steelworks, B.P.Oil Refinery,B.P.Chemicals, Metal Box and a few Aluminium works.However,many of these works have been closed or made much smaller and as a result many people have becomed unemployed. The local council have been very worried about this and have tried to attract other smaller industries to the area.These new factories are sometimes grouped together in small industrial estates.
